title: Yellow Hand - Yellow Hand (1969/2008) [FLAC]
description:
Yellow Hand - Yellow Hand (1969/2008)

US, west coast folk psych

Tracklist:

01. Down To The Wire (4:20)
02. Sell Out (3:41)
03. Home (3:24)
04. Neighbor Don't You Worry (2:17)
05. We'll See (2:58)
06. Come On (2:44)
07. God Knows I Love You (3:00)
08. My World Needs You (3:15)
09. Hello I've Returned (3:04)
10. Freedom Express (2:50) 

Personnel;
*Mickey Armstrong - Bass, Vocals
*Joe Campese - Rhythm Guitar, Vocals
*Pat Flynn - Lead Guitar, Vocals
*Jerry Tawney - Vocals, Percussion
*Oscar Tessier - Drums, Percussion
*Kenny Trujillo - Keyboards

Recorded in 1969, this superb rural rock collection has been described as 'an extra Buffalo Springfield album' because it includes, for mysterious reasons, six rare songs by Neil Young and Stephen Stills. These were composed and demoed during Buffalo Springfield's heyday, but not released by them. Elsewhere there are three tracks penned by leader Jerry Tawney and a classy cover of Delaney & Bonnie's 'God Knows I Love You'. With tasty guitar leads and harmony vocals throughout, this lost gem is a treat for all fans of West Coast rock.
